meanings.definition: A skilled worker who makes things by hand.
meanings.sent1: The artisans crafted beautiful pottery in their workshop.
meanings.sent2: Local artisans sell their handmade jewelry at the market.
meanings.sent3: The artisans decided to have a race to see who could make the fastest clay pot.
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, artisans are the painters of life's canvas.
meanings.sent5: The artisans' intricate wood carvings were a testament to their talent.

meanings.definition: A person or company that produces high-quality, unique products.
meanings.sent1: The artisans' bakery was famous for its delicious pastries.
meanings.sent2: Artisans from around the world showcase their goods at the trade fair.
meanings.sent3: The fashion artisans decided to design a line of clothing for pets.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of innovation, artisans are the architects of new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The artisans' attention to detail set their products apart from the rest.
